title: nambina pErgaLai
sahitya:
nambina pErgaLaik-kaiviDa mATTAnammA jnAna paNita duraiyE


anupallavi

  ambalak-kUttADiyin shen kanar-selvanenrum anbu vaittavariDam Ashai vaippAnammA


caraNam    kAdalum poi illai kanavugaLum poi illai kai piDittavan shollaik-kaDaip-piDippAn meyyE
shOdanai sheidu konjum suNDippArtt-uLLattai sukham taruvAn Arumukhan guhan vEl murugan
